We want to continue to offer our training and healing services on a donation basis. We do not charge for the work that we do. Your support is important. Thank You! God bless your generosity.

No information on this website is intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. The healing ministry of Tri-Part is not intended to replace the medical care of your physician.
